ENGAGEMENT_1.title: Arena challenge for you: {ARENA_THEME_NAME}
ENGAGEMENT_1.body: Are you the undisputed champion? Challenge other experts on the topic and prove your knowledge!

ENGAGEMENT_2.title: Today's arenas are ready!
ENGAGEMENT_2.body: Thrilling challenges await you—enter the arena and be the last gladiator standing!

RETENTION_1.title: It's been a long time since you trained your mind!
RETENTION_1.body: There's a prize waiting to be claimed

RETENTION_2.title: It's quiz time!
RETENTION_2.body: The other players are waiting for you in your World! Challenge them now!

RETENTION_3.title: New theme {THEME_NAME} added
RETENTION_3.body: Congratulations, a new theme is now unlocked and shareable in the shop!

RETENTION_4.title: Less than a day left until the season ends!
RETENTION_4.body: The other league players are climbing the leaderboard!

RETENTION_5.title: You have advanced to the {LEAGUE_NAME} league!
RETENTION_5.body: Welcome to the new league! You have rewards to claim!

RETENTION_6.title: You have stayed afloat this season!
RETENTION_6.body: You are still in the {LEAGUE_NAME} league! Get ready for some quizzes!

RETENTION_7.title: Oh no! You're about to be relegated!
RETENTION_7.body: But don't worry, you still have a chance to save yourself and keep all your progress!

REFERRAL_1.title: Invite a friend!
REFERRAL_1.body: Prove that you are the undisputed quiz master!

REFERRAL_2.title: {INVITING_USER_NAME} wants to challenge you!
REFERRAL_2.body: Jump into the game now and win the VS Friends match!

REFERRAL_4.title: {INVITED_USER_NAME} is now your friend!
REFERRAL_4.body: Play a VS Friends match and prove you're the strongest

REVIEW.title: Are you having fun with Witz?
REVIEW.body: Leave a great review and help us grow!

general.title: Something went wrong...
general.description: Trivia time: What’s unexpected, a bit annoying, and being fixed right now? This error! Be right back...

noInternet.title: No internet connection
noInternet.description: No internet, no fun. Let's get you back online so the quiz party can continue!

updatedApp.title: Time for an Upgrade!
updatedApp.description: Looks like WITZ needs a little tune-up to keep the fun rolling. We promise it’s worth it!

bottomSheet.title: Choose your favourite log in method
bottomSheet.disclaimer: By registering on WITZ, you agree to our

addAccount.title: Save your progress
addAccount.description: Create your profile to keep your progress safe! If you continue as a guest, all your data may be lost if you uninstall the app or log out.

signOutModal.title: Sign out of account?
signOutModal.message: Your progress and purchases will be saved and can be accessed by re-signing in.

deleteModal.title: Delete account?
deleteModal.message: You will lose all your progress and purchases permanently.

account_exists_with_different_credential.title: Account conflict detected
account_exists_with_different_credential.message: An account with this email already exists under a different sign-in method. Please sign in using your existing account and then link your credentials.

invalid_credential.title: Invalid or expired credentials
invalid_credential.message: The credential provided is invalid or has expired. Please try again.

provider_already_linked.title: You’re already connected
provider_already_linked.message: Your account is already linked to this sign-in method. Please try again later.

credential_already_in_use.title: This account is already in use
credential_already_in_use.message: You have already created an account with this email. Please log out and log in with the desired method to use that account.

email_already_in_use.title: This email is already taken
email_already_in_use.message: This email is already associated with an existing account. Please sign in using one of your linked methods.

home.leagueInfo: This is your League performances! Earn Delta Points based on your answers in VS Mode and climb the leaderboard to advance to the next league!
home.tgInfo: Answer correctly in VS Mode to advance through the Training Ground! Reach the end of the path and unlock your first League!

dailyLoginDialog.title: Daily gift
dailyLoginDialog.body: Return tomorrow for the next reward!

account.title: back up your account
account.body: Sign in to protect your account and save all your progresses!

friends.title: Invite your friends and get rewards!

game.themeSelectionTitle: which theme do you want to play?
game.vsWorldInfo: Face random opponents from around the world in a series of questions. Whoever gets the highest score at the end of the match will be the winner!
game.vsFriendsInfo: Face your friends in a private match. Whoever gets the highest score at the end of the match will be the winner!
game.selectedThemeInfo: tap the card and select a theme

gameTypePage.title: How do you want to start?

createMatchBtn.title: create match
createMatchBtn.body: Create a private lobby and invite your friends

joinMatchBtn.title: join match
joinMatchBtn.body: Enter a game code to join an existing match

roundAmountPage.title: select round number
roundAmountPage.body: How many rounds do you want to play?

codePage.title: enter the match code
codePage.body: ask the host for the 5 digit code to join the match

matchLanguageSheet.title: match language
matchLanguageSheet.body: you can change the language of this match

performance.tokensTooltip: You can earn League Tokens based on your performance during the match. The more Tokens you get, the higher you climb in your League. Aim for the top!
performance.answersTooltip: The more correct answers you give, the more Tokens you get! Each correct answer gives you {} League Tokens.
performance.rankMultiplierTootip: The rank multiplier increases your League Tokens according to how many players you passed in the final ranking of the match.

rejoinGame.title: Reconnect to your match?
rejoinGame.message: You were disconnected from an ongoing match. Do you want to reconnect and continue playing, or leave and lose all your progress?
rejoinGame.waitRejoin: wait while we load the match

playAgain.waiting: Waiting for host to decide whether to start a new match or end the game...

upToPromotion.title: You advanced to the Promotion zone!
upToPromotion.description: Keep pushing to earn your spot in the next League!

upToNeutral.title: You advanced to the safe zone!
upToNeutral.description: You’re out of the danger zone. Now aim higher!

downToNeutral.title: You’ve dropped into the safe zone!
downToNeutral.description: Keep pushing to earn your spot in the next League!

downToDemotion.title: You’ve dropped into the demotion zone!
downToDemotion.description: Keep pushing to earn your spot in the next League!

leaveGame.title: Leave match
leaveGame.description: Do you want to leave the match? All your progresses will be lost.

hostLeft.title: Host left the match
hostLeft.description: The host left the match. The lobby will be closed and all players will be disconnected.

bundle.title: Become a Witzard
bundle.body: Take advantage of this offer and become one of the Witz masters! Discover the Wizard within you!

powers.title: Stock up on Power-Ups
powers.body: Take advantage of this offer, gear up with power-ups, and win all your challenges!

themes.title: 3x1 offer
themes.body: Rush to the shop to grab your favorite themes and challenge your friends!

removeAds.title: Play without distractions
removeAds.description: Tired of interruptions? Unlock 30 days of uninterrupted trivia fun! No more ads bothering you—just pure, seamless gameplay.

hearts.title: out of hearts?
hearts.description: Don't let the fun stop here! Grab one of the Heart bundles and jump back into the game!

remove_ads_1m.title: Remove all ads
remove_ads_1m.description: Remove ads at the end of the match for 30 days. @:shop.offers.remove_ads_1m.notes
remove_ads_1m.notes: NOTE: Does not apply to ads with rewards.

missingGems.title: buy missing gems
missingGems.body: to complete this purchase, you need

themes.title: themes
themes.info: Personalise your game with your favourite topics!
themes.allUnlocked: You unlocked all themes for this category

gems.title: gems
gems.info: Use Gems to buy special items and upgrades!

hearts.title: hearts
hearts.info: You need Hearts to play matches; don't run out!

power_ups.title: power-ups
power_ups.info: Activate boosts to help you win tough rounds!

theme.info: Test your knowledge with new questions!

avatar.name: New avatar
avatar.info: Customise your look in your Profile and show off your style!

themes.witzMasteryInfo: Unlock themes in this category to increase your WITZ Mastery. Complete the bar to earn a special prize!
themes.themeDetailBody: Test yourself on the {} theme with questionl like

body.locked: Buy the theme to unlock this mission

themeMasterySheet.congratsButtonText: You unlocked the final mastery level
themeMasterySheet.missionSubtext: Complete this mission to unlock the next mastery level
themeMasterySheet.missionInfo: Complete this mission to unlock the next mastery level of this theme!

mission.one: Give 1 correct answer on this theme
mission.other: Give {} correct answers on this theme

themeMasterySheet.congratulationsBody: You unlocked the final mastery level!

witzMasterySheet.body: Unlock {} themes of this category to get a special reward
witzMasterySheet.cta1: unlock all themes in this category

themeDetail.tryQuestions: Try some questions of this theme!
themeDetail.descripiton: Get it now and show that you're an expert!
themeDetail.bonusGiftDescription: Unlock this theme and get an exclusive avatar!

league.info: This is your current League. Finish the season in the top 10 to get promoted! The last 5 will relegate to the previous League.

leagueDescription.trainingGround: Give correct answers in @:game.vsWorld or @:game.vsFriends to advance the ladder and access your first League!
leagueDescription.currentLeague: This is your league! It's time to play a match to climb the rankings and reach the next league by the end of the season
leagueDescription.prevLeague: Do you remember when you were in this league? It feels like just yesterday... Keep playing and watch out for relegations, or you might find yourself back here soon!
leagueDescription.nextLeague: Climb the leaderboard to reach this League! Only the top players of the season will be promoted, so do your best!

welcomePage.title: You made it to the leagues

1.title: Climb the ranks
1.body: Compete in a ranked League and earn League Tokens throughout the Season. Your position on the leaderboard determines your fate!

2.title: Season progression
2.body: Each Season is timed! At the end, the top 10% of players move up, the bottom 10% move down, and the rest stay in their League.

3.title: Get rewards
3.body: Higher ranks mean better rewards! Keep climbing to reach the top and unlock bigger prizes in the best Leagues.

tg.title: Training ground
tg.info: Give correct answers in VS Mode to advance the ladder and access your first League!

1.title: Prove your skills
1.body: Before joining the ranked Leagues, complete the Training Ground. Advance through the path by proving your skills!

2.title: League Tokens
2.body: Earn League Tokens by answering questions correctly! At the end of the match, your total tokens are multiplied based on how many competitors you outscore on the leaderboard.

3.title: Progress by playing
3.body: Answer correctly in “VS World” and “VS Friends” modes to move forward. Each correct answer brings you closer to your first League.

4.title: Unlock rewards
4.body: Along the way, earn special rewards as you progress. Reach the end of the path to enter your first ranked League and get even better rewards!

startZone.title: Start Zone
startZone.body: Give correct answers to advance the ladder and Access your first league

demoted.message: Damn! You are no longer in {}...

protection.title: league protection
protection.description: Stay in this league one more season

demoted.beBetter: Do your best in the next season

arena.body: Test your knowledge with these time-limited events and get rewards!
arena.info: In Arena mode, play timed events and test your skills! Answer as many questions as you can without making a mistake. One error and you're out!
arena.eventEndsRewards: The event is still ongoing! Come back later to claim your rewards.
arena.noPlayers: Be the first to challenge the arena and claim your throne

game.keepPlaying: Do you want to keep playing?
game.keepPlayingBody: It’s not too late! You can still get another shot and stay in the match.

1.title: Enter the arena
1.body: Compete in daily themed challenges against all players. Each day brings new themes to test your knowledge!

2.title: Stay in the game
2.body: Answer as many questions as possible without mistakes. One wrong answer, and you're out—so think carefully!

3.title: Get a second chance
3.body: You can use Gems to revive and keep playing, or try again for a better score and climb the leaderboard!

themeUpsell.title: do you like this theme?
themeUpsell.subtext: Get it now and show that you’re an expert!
themeUpsell.questionsTitle: Test your knowledge with questions like
themeUpsell.buttonText: get exclusive {} questions and prove your skills!

powerUps.title: your power-ups
powerUps.info: When you're in trouble, overcome your opponents with power-ups! You can get them as rewards or buy them in the Shop.

badges.title: badges
badges.info: View the badges of the thems you unlocked and showcase your favourite on your profile!
badges.sheetBody: Select a badge to set it as your favourite

stats.title: witz stats
stats.info: Check your all-time stats! How good have you been?

nameSheet.title: Player Name
nameSheet.body: Your player name will be visible to all players. Please choose a name not offensive to any player.

settingsSheet.title: settings
settingsSheet.signinBody: Sign in to protect your account and save all your progresses!
settingsSheet.languageSheetBody: Select the language of the app

friends.title: friends
friends.noFriends: You look pretty lonely in here...

profile.removeDialogBody: Do you want to remove this player from your friend list?

weeklyChallenge.title: Weekly missions
weeklyChallenge.info: Complete daily missions to fill the weekly challenge bar—unlock bigger rewards based on how many missions you complete in a week.
weeklyChallenge.body: Complete daily missions and unlock the rewards!

tutorial.startInfo: In WITZ you'll face off against other players in a trivia match with 5 rounds. Let's start a match and see how it works!

game.roundSpotlightInfo: Each match has a theme! Each round's question will be based on a category related to this theme.

dialogPowers.title: Boost your score!
dialogPowers.body1: Need an edge to outsmart your opponents? Use Power-Ups!
dialogPowers.body2: Each one offers a unique advantage to help you score big and stay on top.

game.rocketSpotlightInfo: Use Points X2 to double your round score. It boosts both correct and incorrect answers, so use it wisely!
game.eraserSpotlightInfo: Use 50/50 to eliminate two incorrect options. It's great for narrowing down tough choices!
game.peekSpotlightInfo: Use Peek Opponents to see what others are answering in real-time. It's perfect for gaining an edge!
game.shieldSpotlightInfo: Use Error Shield to prevent your answer from counting as wrong. A great safety net!

1.question: Which artist holds the record for the most-streamed song on Spotify?

2.question: In which TV series does the character Walter White appear?

3.question: What does a panda's diet mainly consist of?

4.question: What is the most commonly spoken language in the world?

5.question: Which planet in our solar system has the most moons?

dialogEndGame.title: Well done!
dialogEndGame.body1: That's how a match works. Now it's time to put your skills to the test against your opponents.
dialogEndGame.body2: Climb your league leaderboard and claim the victory!

dialogAuthentication.title: Save your progress!
dialogAuthentication.body: Create your profile to keep your progress safe! If you continue as a guest, all your data may be lost if you uninstall the app or log out.

tutorial.themeNavSpotlightInfo: Want to expand your trivia experience? Start by accessing the Themes section to find new themes!
tutorial.themeSpotlightInfo: Here's the WITZ Starter Pack! Select it to view its details and categories.
tutorial.buyThemeSpotlightInfo: Kickstart your journey with the WITZ Starter Pack! Unlock it for free and start playing!
tutorial.starterPackInfo: This is the starter pack. It's a great way to start!

dialogEndTutorial.title: You're ready to play!
dialogEndTutorial.body1: It's time to dive into the game, challenge opponents, and climb the leaderboard.

username.title: Choose your player name
username.body: Your player name will be visible to all players. Please choose a name not offensive to any player.
username.invalidWarning: This name goes against our community policies. Please change it to another player name.

avatar.title: Choose your avatar
avatar.invalidWarning: The image you uploaded was deemed offensive according to our guidelines.

topics.title: What are your favourite topics?
topics.body: Choose your favourite topics to have a personalized gaming experience.

referral.title: refer-a-pal program
referral.body: Invite friends that are still not in the game, make them play a match and earn rewards!

gem.info: Use Gems to buy special items and upgrades!

heart.info: You need Hearts to play matches; don't run out!

rocket.name: double points
rocket.info: For one round, doubles your round points! But beware! It works both positevely and negatively.

bomb.info: For one round, erases two wrong answers immediatly.

peek.name: peek opponents
peek.info: For one round, take a peek at what your opponents are responding to.

shield.name: error shield
shield.info: For one round, a wrong answer does not count as an error.

link_messages.referral: {} wants to invite you to play WITZ! Join the community.✨
